turkish_example_sentence: Biz şehirde ucuz modern daireler bulacaktık ama fiyatlar yüksekti.
english_example_sentence: We were going to find cheap modern apartments in the city but prices were high.
russian_example_sentence: Мы собирались найти дешёвые современные квартиры в городе, но цены были высокими.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz şehirde ucuz modern daireler ______ ama fiyatlar yüksekti.
